mapper.update:
update tb_market_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
button_id = #{buttonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_market_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, header = #{header,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_id = #{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, button_id = #{buttonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_id = #{authorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select market_info.id,market_info.name,market_info.header,market_info.content,market_info.img_id,market_info.button_id,market_info.post_time,market_info.author_id, img.id img_id,img.name img_name,img.url img_url,img.css_class img_css_class, button.id button_id,button.name button_name,button.url button_url,button.css_class button_css_class, author.id author_id,author.name author_name,author.pwd author_pwd,author.alias_nm author_alias_nm, author.gender author_gender,author.email author_email,author.close_flg author_close_flg,author.lock_up author_lock_up from tb_market_info market_info left join tb_image img on img.id = market_info.img_id left join tb_button button on button.id = market_info.button_id left join tb_author author on author.id = market_info.author_id
